channel.title: How do you not love Uppit?
channel.description:
I lol everytime I download something. No ads and this guy screaming at you:
[img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/7631/screenshot020ce.jpg[/img]
It almost kind of makes me want to download a virus. But that's mediafire and mediafire isn't awesome :(
What do you think?
http://uppit.com/4zoaxy2bo8bq/ScreenShot020.jpg

item.title: How do you not love Uppit?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I don’t really use anything over the other, but I do remember Uppit never working very well with Opera. I use Firefox now and haven’t had any problems, but I pretty much use whichever site comes to mind first.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not love Uppit?

item.title: How do you not love Uppit?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

It was very unreliable around a year ago, when they were updating it. All my links have become invalid, whereas the mediafire ones are all still going strong.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not love Uppit?

item.title: How do you not love Uppit?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Graham:

I’m banned from uppit because one of my large files got downloaded around 20,000 times

Lmao that sucks xD

item.title: How do you not love Uppit?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:6, topic:416232”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=518175.msg3765516#msg3765516 date=1317206296]

Uppit is the most common spreader of viruses as it doesn’t scan file. Mediafire is faster and does.

And any REAL antivirus software would scan all incoming data, and stop the malicious file from even being saved to the hard drive.
[/quote]AVG does the job for me, downloaded a trojan once and after 2 seconds in downloading (not completed) it removed it.[/quote]AVG sucks, malwarebytes is where to go.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not love Uppit?
